name: Zoho CRM
description: Add a Zoho CRM Instance to connect your existing Zoho CRM account to the CRM Hub, allowing you to manage contacts, leads, accounts, opportunities etc. across multiple CRM Elements. You will need your Zoho CRM account information to add an instance.
configDescription: If you do not have a Zoho CRM account, you can create one at Zoho Signup

configuration.name: User Name or Email
configuration.description: Zoho CRM User Name or Email

configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter
configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector

configuration.name: Authentication URL
configuration.description: Zoho CRM authentication URL. The value is domain specific. For ".com" domain, it is "https://accounts.zoho.com/apiauthtoken/nb/create", for ".eu" domain "https://accounts.zoho.eu/apiauthtoken/nb/create"

configuration.name: A holder for the notification subscription ID
configuration.description: A holder for the notification subscription ID

configuration.name: Filter null values from the response
configuration.description: Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses.

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings

configuration.name: Event poller refresh interval
configuration.description: Used to determine how often to poll the service endpoints (in minutes)

configuration.name: Event Poller Resources Configuration
configuration.description: Event Poller Resources Configuration. If the "event.poller.urls" configuration is defined, this field's value is ignored. The configuration is defined via JSON, an example of which is as follows - { "contacts": { "url": "/hubs/crm/contacts?where=update_time >= ' ${gmtDate:yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss}'", 	"idField": "id", 	" filterByUpdatedDate": true, 	"datesConfiguration": { "updatedDateField": "update_time", "updatedDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss", "updatedDateTimezone": "GMT", 	    "createdDateField": "add_time", "createdDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss", "createdDateTimezone": "GMT" }, "createdCheckTolerance": 2 } }

configuration.name: Callback Notification Signature Key
configuration.description: A key used to generate a validation hash header of the event/bulk notification webhook callback payload
